title: VisualPlugins not registering SDF elements (Gazebo2, Indigo) -> (Gazebo7, Kinetic)

content.raw:
We're migrating our systems to ROS Kinetic, and ran into the following issue:

Plugin elements defined in the URDF [here](https://github.com/utexas-bwi/segbot/blob/master/segbot_description/urdf/components/laptop.urdf.xacro#L72) are no longer being read in the corresponding ROS Gazebo plugin [here](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/jade-devel/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_video.cpp#L139).

This same error does not occur in case of ModelPlugins.

I've verified that running the following command (after generating the urdf from xacro works) retains the elements in the SDF 1.6 format produced. Both files are attached to this issue report:
```
gz sdf --print segbot_v2.urdf > segbot_v2.sdf
```
content.html:
We're migrating our systems to ROS Kinetic, and ran into the following issue:

Plugin elements defined in the URDF here are no longer being read in the corresponding ROS Gazebo plugin here.

This same error does not occur in case of ModelPlugins.

I've verified that running the following command (after generating the urdf from xacro works) retains the elements in the SDF 1.6 format produced. Both files are attached to this issue report:

gz sdf --print segbot_v2.urdf > segbot_v2.sdf
